content.text: Hello there! I'm John, it's nice to meet you. What's your name?
Hi John, my name is Sara. It's nice to meet you too.
What do you like to do in your free time?
I enjoy sewing my own clothing, and I love to go fishing. What do you like to do?
I love to spend time with my horses and ride them. I also love to go fishing, and I usually catch sunfish.
That's great! I used to have a horse, but I had to sell him when I moved. I miss riding horses.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure you'll get another horse someday.
Thanks, I hope so. What kind of horses do you have?
I have a Tennessee Walker and a Quarter Horse. They're both really great horses.
I've always wanted to ride a Tennessee Walker. They're such beautiful horses.
They are. They're also really gentle and easy to ride.
That's great to hear. I'm going to have to look into getting one someday.
I think you'd really enjoy having one. They're a great breed of horse
